alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:34PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Livingston and southwestern Tangipahoa Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 434 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springfield, or 8 miles southwest of Hammond. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Albany, Springfield and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 27 and 39. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 24 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston
